Additional information and resources

In this additional chapter, we turn our attention to the foundational elements of digital skills that have been briefly raised in previous sections  Digital Safety, Accessibility & Inclusion, Digital Competencies, and AI & Analytics  as well as the overarching principles of Digital Pedagogy Theory.

These additional sections offer brief overviews rather than deep dives, serving as signposts that point educators towards key resources and concepts that support a robust and responsible approach to digital teaching.

Educators can use these concise summaries as a launchpad for further exploration and mastery of these critical educational themes.
